ExtlPtcpRsltLrnrPgmRqmt.name: ExtlPtcpRsltLrnrPgmRqmt
ExtlPtcpRsltLrnrPgmRqmt.description: Represents a junction between the External Learning Participant Result and Learner Program Requirement objects.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency.

ExternalLearningPtcpResultId.description: The External Learning Participant Result related to the External Participant Result Learner Program Requirement.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearnerProgramRequirementId.description: The Learner Program Requirement related to the External Participant Result Learner Program Requirement.

Name.description: The name of the External Participant Result Learner Program Requirement.

OwnerId.description: The identifier for the owner of the record.
